title: geth snapshot prune-state , snapshot not old enough yet: need 128 more blocks
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `geth version`
CL client & version: e.g. lighthouse/nimbus/prysm@v1.0.0
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Commit hash : (if `develop`)

#### Expected behaviour


#### Actual behaviour
INFO [12-18|03:31:04.429] Chain head was updated                   number=18,808,577 hash=d1384d..0fcd5d root=198c63..207f79 elapsed=5.2542ms
INFO [12-18|03:31:05.081] Imported new potential chain segment     number=18,808,578 hash=3b7b8b..78c82f blocks=1 txs=162 mgas=16.157 elapsed=586.081ms  mgasps=27.568 triedirty=177.26MiB
INFO [12-18|03:31:05.157] Chain head was updated                   number=18,808,578 hash=3b7b8b..78c82f root=c6446b..5938ea elapsed=5.0479ms
INFO [12-18|03:31:19.961] Imported new potential chain segment     number=18,808,578 hash=3598e4..82c1d6 blocks=1 txs=223 mgas=19.503 elapsed=531.131ms  mgasps=36.720 triedirty=178.49MiB
INFO [12-18|03:31:20.936] Imported new potential chain segment     number=18,808,579 hash=70ad3b..59ff5d blocks=1 txs=345 mgas=28.403 elapsed=882.583ms  mgasps=32.182 triedirty=181.52MiB
INFO [12-18|03:31:21.012] Chain reorg detected                     number=18,808,577 hash=d1384d..0fcd5d drop=1 dropfrom=3b7b8b..78c82f add=2  addfrom=70ad3b..59ff5d
INFO [12-18|03:31:21.028] Chain head was updated                   number=18,808,579 hash=70ad3b..59ff5d root=9bfa7c..4dea25 elapsed=15.9961ms




#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
when i stop geth i get this log 
ERROR[12-18|03:31:46.023] Failed to journal state snapshot         err="snapshot [0x86a0d8f0058fed710c7594b07c371632320c15dfb25593c07577132c1aea6b00] missing"
INFO [12-18|03:31:46.023] Writing cached state to disk             block=18,808,581 hash=4a343c..dc43ca root=86a0d8..ea6b00
INFO [12-18|03:31:48.422] Persisted trie from memory database      nodes=164,912 size=53.73MiB time=2.3978165s gcnodes=0 gcsize=0.00B gctime=0s livenodes=230,415 livesize=90.76MiB
INFO [12-18|03:31:48.422] Writing cached state to disk             block=18,808,580 hash=ee45ea..61f778 root=71c71e..0dea0b
INFO [12-18|03:31:48.449] Persisted trie from memory database      nodes=1400    size=575.50KiB time=27.0952ms  gcnodes=0 gcsize=0.00B gctime=0s livenodes=229,015 livesize=90.20MiB
INFO [12-18|03:31:48.451] Writing cached state to disk             block=18,808,454 hash=ce837b..08dc3e root=49b514..09fb83
INFO [12-18|03:31:48.451] Persisted trie from memory database      nodes=0       size=0.00B     time=0s         gcnodes=0 gcsize=0.00B gctime=0s livenodes=229,015 livesize=90.20MiB
INFO [12-18|03:31:48.536] Looking for peers                        peercount=0 tried=87  static=0
INFO [12-18|03:31:48.888] Blockchain stopped

when i run geth snapshot prune-state
i get this output 
C:\Users\Tausif>geth snapshot prune-state
INFO [12-18|03:32:30.281] Maximum peer count                       ETH=50 LES=0 total=50
INFO [12-18|03:32:30.286] Set global gas cap                       cap=50,000,000
INFO [12-18|03:32:30.286] Initializing the KZG library             backend=gokzg
INFO [12-18|03:32:30.411] Using pebble as the backing database
INFO [12-18|03:32:30.412] Allocated cache and file handles         database=C:\Users\Tausif\AppData\Local\Ethereum\geth\chaindata cache=512.00MiB handles=8192
INFO [12-18|03:32:45.140] Opened ancient database                  database=C:\Users\Tausif\AppData\Local\Ethereum\geth\chaindata\ancient/chain readonly=false
WARN [12-18|03:32:45.269] Snapshot maintenance disabled (syncing)
INFO [12-18|03:32:45.288] Initialized state bloom                  size=2.00GiB
ERROR[12-18|03:32:54.706] Failed to prune state                    err="snapshot not old enough yet: need 128 more blocks"
snapshot not old enough yet: need 128 more blocks


i tried with changing flags as geth -snapshot=false and geth -snapshot=true then repeating the above steps again but still same error please guide.
